questions.question: Name of the Health Centre
location
Where is the health centre located?
What type of health centre is this?
Is this health centre Birthing Centre?
What is your role within the health centre?
In an average, how many patient and their caretaker visit daily in this health centre?
Is there regular water supply in this health centre?
What is the main water source for the facility?

options.name: Piped water into dwelling (into the building)

questions.question: If no regular supply of water, what is the source currently being used?
Where is the main water point for the facility located?

options.name: On the premises of the health centre

options: Piped water to yard/plot|Public tap/standpipe|Deep tubewell/borehole|Shallow tubewell/borehole|AIRP (arsenic iron removable plant)|Protected dug well|Unprotected dug well|Protected spring|Unprotected spring|Rainwater collection

questions.question: Is there water supply in Health Centre all the time and sufficient for all the purpose?

options.name: Yes, available for daily use and enough
Every week five days or more supply but not enough
Less than 5 days in a week

questions.question: Is drinking water available is every wards and accessible to staffs, patients and caretakers?

options.name: Yes, reliable drinking water station available and accessible to all staffs, patients and caretakers
Reliable drinking water is available in some places or some times or not accessible to everyone

questions.question: Is water easily accessible to people with disability or for people requiring support?
Is there enough water storage for 2 days to fulfill the pre-determined demand of Health Centre?

options.name: Yes, enough water storage to fulfill demand for 2 days
Yes, there is storage but not enough for 2 days

questions.question: Is there practice of water purification (point of use treatment) before drinking?
How is drinking water treatment done?

options.name: Use of Chlorine solution (Piyush, aquatab, chlorine tab)

questions.question: Is there water quality test conducted in past 5 years?
Does the water quality test show that water is fit for drinking?

options.name: Yes, water is safe for drinking
No, water is not safe for drinking

questions.question: Is there residual chlorine in drinking water?

options.name: Yes, it has required amount of chlorine
Yes, residual chlorine is there but less than 0.2 mg
No treatment of water/don't know about residual chlorine/ no capacity to test residual chlorine/ no drinking water facility

questions.question: Is there energy/electricity available for water boiling and other provisions?
Is there bathing place and area available, accessible and operational for staffs and patients?

options.name: Yes, atleast one bathing place or area available per 40 in patients, accessible and operationsl
Yes, at least one bathing place or area available but no water or unmanaged or available but less than 1 for every 40 patients
No any bathing space or area available

questions.question: Is there enough lighting on bathing space or area?

options.name: Physical structure for lighting available but not operational
No enough lighting structure or usage

options: Yes, atleast one bathing place or area available per 40 in patients, accessible and operationsl|Yes, at least one bathing place or area available but no water or unmanaged or available but less than 1 for every 40 patients

questions.question: Is there at least one usable toilet available for outpatients at the facility?
What type of toilet is that?

options.name: toilet that flush/poor flush but don't know where
toilet that flush/poor flush to elsewhere
toilet that flush/poor flush to septic tank
toilet that flush/poor flush to piped sewer system

questions.question: Is there at least one usable toilet designated for women and girls - patients?
What type of toilet is that?

options.name: toilet that flush/poor flush but don't know where
toilet that flush/poor flush to elsewhere
toilet that flush/poor flush to septic tank
toilet that flush/poor flush to piped sewer system

questions.question: Does the toilet has a bin with a lid on it within the chamber?
Does the toilet have water and soap available in a private space for washing?
Is there at least one usable toilet designated for staffs?
What type of toilet is that?

options.name: toilet that flush/poor flush but don't know where
toilet that flush/poor flush to elsewhere
toilet that flush/poor flush to septic tank
toilet that flush/poor flush to piped sewer system

questions.question: Is there at least one usable toilet designated for women and girls - staff?
What type of toilet is that?

options.name: toilet that flush/poor flush but don't know where
toilet that flush/poor flush to elsewhere
toilet that flush/poor flush to septic tank
toilet that flush/poor flush to piped sewer system

questions.question: Is there at least one usable  toilet that meets the needs of people with reduced mobility?
What type of toilet is that?

options.name: toilet that flush/poor flush but don't know where
toilet that flush/poor flush to elsewhere
toilet that flush/poor flush to septic tank
toilet that flush/poor flush to piped sewer system

questions.question: Is someone assigned for cleaning the toilet facility for patients?
Has the facilities ever been emptied?

options: Pit latrine without slab/open pit|Pit latrine with slab|Twinpit offset latrine|Ventilated Improved Pit latrine (VIP)|Composting toilet|toilet that flush/poor flush to septic tank

questions.question: Is there any potable toilet availble in the health centre?
Is there operational hand washing stations in the toilets of health centres?

options.name: Yes, hand washing station available within 5 meters from toilets
Yes, hand washing station available within 5 meters from toilets but not operational or no soap or water
No, hand washing station is not available within 5 meters from toilets

questions.question: Is the toilet cleaning record sheet available and in the place where everyone can see?

options.name: Yes, available and cleaner has signed it every time
Toilets are clean but not recorded
No record toilet are cleaned less than once in a day

questions.question: Is there appropriate insite treatment facility (septic tank/ soakage pit) or operational sewerage facility for waste water management?

options.name: Yes but wastewater treatment facility is not operated properly

questions.question: Is there grey water management facility available and operational?

options.name: Yes but not operational (waste water puddle can be seen)

questions.question: Are there enough lighting in the toilets (including for night as well)?

options.name: Yes lighting structure available but not oerational
No enough physical structure or usage enough

questions.question: Hand hygiene promotion materials

options.name: Yes, available in main spots and easily visible
Yes, easily visible but not available in all the places

questions.question: COVID-19 risk communication materials are posted in key locations

options.name: Available in few places not all

questions.question: Hand hygiene compliance activities performed regularly
Staff regularly inspect hand hygiene stations for adequate soap, other hand cleaners and safe water levels.

options.name: Yes, knows the process but not implemented
Does not know the process and not implemented

questions.question: Floor and working surface looks clean

options.name: Some floors and space looks clean but not all
Most or all floors doesn't look clean

questions.question: Suitable and well-kept material available for cleaning

options.name: Yes available but not managed well

questions.question: Personal safety equipment is available for all cleaning and waste disposal staff

options.name: Available but are not in a good condition

questions.question: Gloves, aprons, and boots are provided in good condition for all cleaning and garbage disposal staff.

options.name: Available but are not in a good condition

questions.question: Employees can perform the correct procedures for cleaning and disposal

options.name: Yes, at least one staff is capable
Staff can demonstrate correct procedure but is not implemented
Can not perform but has knowledge on correct procedures

questions.question: Cleaning records are viewed and signed by cleaners each day

options.name: Yes, easily viewable and cleaning staff signed every day

questions.question: Do you segregate waste before disposal?
What type of dustbin are being used for waste segregation?
What are the different categories of segregated waste?

options.name: Non hazardous non decomposible waste (Plastic Bottles, Papers, Saline Bottles, Clothes, etc)
Hazardous, that can be burned (Gauze, Cotton, Medicine, Blood, etc)
Hazardous that cannot be burned (Syringe, Blood Packets, Gloves, etc)

questions.question: Do you treat waste by yourself?
How do you manage/dispose health centre's waste?
How do you dispose degradable waste?
How do you dispose non-hazardous non decomposible waste?

options: Non hazardous non decomposible waste (Plastic Bottles, Papers, Saline Bottles, Clothes, etc)

questions.question: How do you dispose hazardous waste that can be burnt?

options: Hazardous, that can be burned (Gauze, Cotton, Medicine, Blood, etc)

questions.question: How do you dispose hazardous waste that cannot be burnt?

options: Hazardous that cannot be burned (Syringe, Blood Packets, Gloves, etc)

questions.question: How to clean reusable medical equipment? Such as scissors, forceps, blades etc.
Is there responsible person available for Health centre waste management?

options.name: One person available but not trained

questions.question: Is there health safety measures available per waste management person?

options.name: Yes but available for only few or not in well condition

questions.question: Enough natural ventilation and air flow in health centre

options.name: Yes few ventilation but not enough

questions.question: Are beds of patient maintained with enough distancing (at least 1 metre)

options.name: Yes, every bed are at least 1 meter apart

questions.question: WASH FIT or any other quality improvement plan

options.name: Yes available, implemented and regularly monitored
Yes available but not implemented and monitored regularly

questions.question: Enough cleaning staff and WASH maintenance staff
Regular audit of hand washing station and supplies

options.name: Yes plans are there but not regularly conducted

questions.question: New staff takes IPC training
Regular Training/ IPC training and WASH refresher

options.name: Yes but not updated annually or not every staff is trained

questions.question: Designated WASH or IPC focal person

options.name: Yes, but cannot provide enough time and resource

questions.question: How many cases of diarrheoa of children below 5 years of age have been reported in the last 2 weeks?
How many cases of diarrheoa of people above 5 years of age have been reported in the last 2 weeks?
Is there an active community management group?

options.name: There is a community management group, but not active

questions.question: Is there a fund or budget allocation for operation and maintenance for water and sanitation in the health centre?
Observe: Is water available from the main water point at time of the survey?

options: On the premises of the health centre

questions.question: Is their sanitation materials (Brush, Harpic, Disinfectant etc) avilable?
Observe: Are hygiene stations available at the selected point of care?
Observe: Are the hygiene stations at the selected point of care functional on the day of the survey?

options.name: No, not functional or lacking material

questions.question: Observe: Are handwashing facilities available within 5 meters from the toilet?
Observe: Are soap and water available at these handwashing facilities (within 5 meter from toilet) on the day of the survey?

options.name: Yes, water and soap are available

questions.question: Observe: Is there separate operational waste container available?

options.name: Yes available nearer to the waste production site, hazardous, non hazardous and sharp waste separated
Separate container available but not in proper condition

questions.question: Observe: Are there functional waste pits or any other available disposal methods in operation?

options.name: Yes available but not sufficient of managed properly

questions.question: Observe: Is there any treatment technology for infectious and sharp waste

options.name: Yes but not operational or enough
